name: Resident Evil RPG
summary:
Resident Evil RPG is a fangame based on the original Resident Evil (the one released for PlayStation, Saturn and PC), which also includes certain elements from Resident Evil Rebirth (Gamecube).

Resident Evil RPG was developed in RPG Maker XP by Evilbiel and co-produced by Dungeon Master and follows the story of a police team, S.T.A.R.S, who go to investigate a sinister mansion where there have been macabre reports of murders.

The game has extra unlockable modes with new adventures (some fake), with a storyline behind the main one! The project came from the idea of playing Resident Evil from a new perspective, in 2D, but far surpassing Resident Evil Gaiden, from the Game Boy Color!
